title: STRESS DETOX
author: Nicole Eckert; CNP
description: Professional supplement pairing for Stress Detox. Sleep is key to a healthy start the next day. The best way to wake up refreshed is to start the night on an empty stomach and support the natural tendency of the body to sleep detox. When supported during sleep, the body is less likely to wake up to unhealthy cravings and is more likely to focus on clearing toxic metabolites
